name: Dengue
description: Viral infection spread by Aedes mosquitoes; causes high fever, joint pain, rash.

name: Malaria
description: Parasitic infection transmitted by Anopheles mosquitoes; causes cyclic fever, chills and anemia.

name: Tuberculosis
description: Bacterial lung infection causing prolonged cough, weight loss and night sweats.

name: Diabetes
description: Metabolic condition with high blood sugar; symptoms include excessive thirst and fatigue.

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure often without symptoms; increases risk of heart disease and stroke.
